maml:description.maml:para: {{ Adds a maintenance schedule to a host }}
{{ Adds a maintenance schedule to a host }}
{{ Name of the EventSentry group of the host }}
{{ Name of the host to which to add the maintenance schedule }}
{{ Length of the maintenance schedule in seconds, minutes, hours or days }}

{{ Name of the EventSentry group of the host }}
{{ Name of the host to which to add the maintenance schedule }}
{{ Time scale, can be one of the following: sec min hour day }}
{{ Length of the maintenance schedule in seconds, minutes, hours or days }}

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> {{ Add-ESMaintenance "Default Group" SERVER01 15 min }}

dev:remarks.maml:para: {{ Starts a 15 minute maintenance schedule for host SERVER01 in group "Default Group" }}

maml:description.maml:para: {{ Activates a new EventSentry configuration }}

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> {{ Set-ESVariable EMAILRECIPIENT admin.john@yourcompany.com "Network Devices" }}

dev:remarks.maml:para: {{ Set the value of the variable EMAILRECIPIENT to admin.john@yourcompany.com for all hosts in the "Network Devices" group }}
